summary: At 12 years old, Kermit the Frog and best friends Goggles and Croaker travel outside their homes in the swamps of the Deep South to do something extraordinary with their lives.
cast: Steve Whitmire|Bill Barretta|Dave Goelz|Joey Mazzarino|John Kennedy|Alice Dinnean|Jerry Nelson|Cree Summer|Jarrod W. Amos|Ryan H. Amos|Bill Bookston|Kelly Collins Lintz|Stephen Denmark|Hampton Dixon|Carolyn Green|Drew Haggard|John Hostetter|Christian Kebbel|Lauren Leech|Casey Leslie|Heather Lucas|J.W. Moore|Kelly Newton|Humberto Recio|Andy Stone|Melissa Whitmire|Dan Wilkerson|Joe Schofield
title: Las primeras aventuras de Gustavo
